Method.name: OnPage
Method.Description: Event handler for PAGE event: this is invoked in order to generate the content of a csp page.

Method.name: HTMLBody
HTMLHead
CSSLibCodeMirror
Method.Implementation:
W !,"/* BASICS */",! W !,".CodeMirror {" W !," /* Set height, width, borders, and global font properties here */" W !," font-family: monospace;" W !," height: 300px;" W !," color: black;" W !,"}",! W !,"/* PADDING */",! W !,".CodeMirror-lines {" W !," padding: 4px 0; /* Vertical padding around content */" W !,"}" W !,".CodeMirror pre {" W !," padding: 0 4px; /* Horizontal padding of content */" W !,"}",! W !,".CodeMirror-scrollbar-filler, .CodeMirror-gutter-filler {" W !," background-color: white; /* The little square between H and V scrollbars */" W !,"}",! W !,"/* GUTTER */",! W !,".CodeMirror-gutters {" W !," border-right: 1px solid #ddd;" W !," background-color: #f7f7f7;" W !," white-space: nowrap;" W !,"}" W !,".CodeMirror-linenumbers {}" W !,".CodeMirror-linenumber {" W !," padding: 0 3px 0 5px;" W !," min-width: 20px;" W !," text-align: right;" W !," color: #999;" W !," white-space: nowrap;" W !,"}",! W !,".CodeMirror-guttermarker { color: black; }" W !,".CodeMirror-guttermarker-subtle { color: #999; }",! W !,"/* CURSOR */",! W !,".CodeMirror-cursor {" W !," border-left: 1px solid black;" W !," border-right: none;" W !," width: 0;" W !,"}" W !,"/* Shown when moving in bi-directional text */" W !,".CodeMirror div.CodeMirror-secondarycursor {" W !," border-left: 1px solid silver;" W !,"}" W !,".cm-fat-cursor .CodeMirror-cursor {" W !," width: auto;" W !," border: 0;" W !," background: #7e7;" W !,"}" W !,".cm-fat-cursor div.CodeMirror-cursors {" W !," z-index: 1;" W !,"}",! W !,".cm-animate-fat-cursor {" W !," width: auto;" W !," border: 0;" W !," -webkit-animation: blink 1.06s steps(1) infinite;" W !," -moz-animation: blink 1.06s steps(1) infinite;" W !," animation: blink 1.06s steps(1) infinite;" W !," background-color: #7e7;" W !,"}" W !,"@-moz-keyframes blink {" W !," 0% {}" W !," 50% { background-color: transparent; }" W !," 100% {}" W !,"}" W !,"@-webkit-keyframes blink {" W !," 0% {}" W !," 50% { background-color: transparent; }" W !," 100% {}" W !,"}" W !,"@keyframes blink {" W !," 0% {}" W !," 50% { background-color: transparent; }" W !," 100% {}" W !,"}",! W !,"/* Can style cursor different in overwrite (non-insert) mode */" W !,".CodeMirror-overwrite .CodeMirror-cursor {}",! W !,".cm-tab { display: inline-block; text-decoration: inherit; }"
W !,".CodeMirror-ruler {" W !," border-left: 1px solid #ccc;" W !," position: absolute;" W !,"}"
W !,"/* DEFAULT THEME */"
W !,".cm-s-default .cm-header {color: blue;}" W !,".cm-s-default .cm-quote {color: #090;}" W !,".cm-negative {color: #d44;}" W !,".cm-positive {color: #292;}" W !,".cm-header, .cm-strong {font-weight: bold;}" W !,".cm-em {font-style: italic;}" W !,".cm-link {text-decoration: underline;}" W !,".cm-strikethrough {text-decoration: line-through;}"
W !,".cm-s-default .cm-keyword {color: #708;}" W !,".cm-s-default .cm-atom {color: #219;}" W !,".cm-s-default .cm-number {color: #164;}" W !,".cm-s-default .cm-def {color: #00f;}" W !,".cm-s-default .cm-variable," W !,".cm-s-default .cm-punctuation," W !,".cm-s-default .cm-property," W !,".cm-s-default .cm-operator {}" W !,".cm-s-default .cm-variable-2 {color: #05a;}" W !,".cm-s-default .cm-variable-3 {color: #085;}" W !,".cm-s-default .cm-comment {color: #a50;}" W !,".cm-s-default .cm-string {color: #a11;}" W !,".cm-s-default .cm-string-2 {color: #f50;}" W !,".cm-s-default .cm-meta {color: #555;}" W !,".cm-s-default .cm-qualifier {color: #555;}" W !,".cm-s-default .cm-builtin {color: #30a;}" W !,".cm-s-default .cm-bracket {color: #997;}" W !,".cm-s-default .cm-tag {color: #170;}" W !,".cm-s-default .cm-attribute {color: #00c;}" W !,".cm-s-default .cm-hr {color: #999;}" W !,".cm-s-default .cm-link {color: #00c;}"
W !,".cm-s-default .cm-error {color: #f00;}" W !,".cm-invalidchar {color: #f00;}"
W !,".CodeMirror-composing { border-bottom: 2px solid; }"
W !,"/* Default styles for common addons */"
W !,"div.CodeMirror span.CodeMirror-matchingbracket {color: #0f0;}" W !,"div.CodeMirror span.CodeMirror-nonmatchingbracket {color: #f22;}" W !,".CodeMirror-matchingtag { background: rgba(255, 150, 0, .3); }" W !,".CodeMirror-activeline-background {background: #e8f2ff;}"
W !,"/* STOP */"
W !,"/* The rest of this file contains styles related to the mechanics of" W !," the editor. You probably shouldn't touch them. */"
W !,".CodeMirror {" W !," position: relative;" W !," overflow: hidden;" W !," background: white;" W !,"}"
W !,".CodeMirror-scroll {" W !," overflow: scroll !important; /* Things will break if this is overridden */" W !," /* 30px is the magic margin used to hide the element's real scrollbars */" W !," /* See overflow: hidden in .CodeMirror */" W !," margin-bottom: -30px; margin-right: -30px;" W !," padding-bottom: 30px;" W !," height: 100%;" W !," outline: none; /* Prevent dragging from highlighting the element */" W !," position: relative;" W !,"}" W !,".CodeMirror-sizer {" W !," position: relative;" W !," border-right: 30px solid transparent;" W !,"}"
W !,"/* The fake, visible scrollbars. Used to force redraw during scrolling" W !," before actual scrolling happens, thus preventing shaking and" W !," flickering artifacts. */" W !,".CodeMirror-vscrollbar, .CodeMirror-hscrollbar, .CodeMirror-scrollbar-filler, .CodeMirror-gutter-filler {" W !," position: absolute;" W !," z-index: 6;" W !," display: none;" W !,"}" W !,".CodeMirror-vscrollbar {" W !," right: 0; top: 0;" W !," overflow-x: hidden;" W !," overflow-y: scroll;" W !,"}" W !,".CodeMirror-hscrollbar {" W !," bottom: 0; left: 0;" W !," overflow-y: hidden;" W !," overflow-x: scroll;" W !,"}" W !,".CodeMirror-scrollbar-filler {" W !," right: 0; bottom: 0;" W !,"}" W !,".CodeMirror-gutter-filler {" W !," left: 0; bottom: 0;" W !,"}"
W !,".CodeMirror-gutters {" W !," position: absolute; left: 0; top: 0;" W !," min-height: 100%;" W !," z-index: 3;" W !,"}" W !,".CodeMirror-gutter {" W !," white-space: normal;" W !," height: 100%;" W !," display: inline-block;" W !," vertical-align: top;" W !," margin-bottom: -30px;" W !," /* Hack to make IE7 behave */" W !," *zoom:1;" W !," *display:inline;" W !,"}" W !,".CodeMirror-gutter-wrapper {" W !," position: absolute;" W !," z-index: 4;" W !," background: none !important;" W !," border: none !important;" W !,"}" W !,".CodeMirror-gutter-background {" W !," position: absolute;" W !," top: 0; bottom: 0;" W !," z-index: 4;" W !,"}" W !,".CodeMirror-gutter-elt {" W !," position: absolute;" W !," cursor: default;" W !," z-index: 4;" W !,"}" W !,".CodeMirror-gutter-wrapper {" W !," -webkit-user-select: none;" W !," -moz-user-select: none;" W !," user-select: none;" W !,"}"
W !,".CodeMirror-lines {" W !," cursor: text;" W !," min-height: 1px; /* prevents collapsing before first draw */" W !,"}" W !,".CodeMirror pre {" W !," /* Reset some styles that the rest of the page might have set */" W !," -moz-border-radius: 0; -webkit-border-radius: 0; border-radius: 0;" W !," border-width: 0;" W !," background: transparent;" W !," font-family: inherit;" W !," font-size: inherit;" W !," margin: 0;" W !," white-space: pre;" W !," word-wrap: normal;" W !," line-height: inherit;" W !," color: inherit;" W !," z-index: 2;" W !," position: relative;" W !," overflow: visible;" W !," -webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent;" W !," -webkit-font-variant-ligatures: none;" W !," font-variant-ligatures: none;" W !,"}" W !,".CodeMirror-wrap pre {" W !," word-wrap: break-word;" W !," white-space: pre-wrap;" W !," word-break: normal;" W !,"}"
W !,".CodeMirror-linebackground {" W !," position: absolute;" W !," left: 0; right: 0; top: 0; bottom: 0;" W !," z-index: 0;" W !,"}"
W !,".CodeMirror-linewidget {" W !," position: relative;" W !," z-index: 2;" W !," overflow: auto;" W !,"}"
W !,".CodeMirror-widget {}"
W !,".CodeMirror-code {" W !," outline: none;" W !,"}"
W !,"/* Force content-box sizing for the elements where we expect it */" W !,".CodeMirror-scroll," W !,".CodeMirror-sizer," W !,".CodeMirror-gutter," W !,".CodeMirror-gutters," W !,".CodeMirror-linenumber {" W !," -moz-box-sizing: content-box;" W !," box-sizing: content-box;" W !,"}"
W !,".CodeMirror-measure {" W !," position: absolute;" W !," width: 100%;" W !," height: 0;" W !," overflow: hidden;" W !," visibility: hidden;" W !,"}"
W !,".CodeMirror-cursor { position: absolute; }" W !,".CodeMirror-measure pre { position: static; }"
W !,"div.CodeMirror-cursors {" W !," visibility: hidden;" W !," position: relative;" W !," z-index: 3;" W !,"}" W !,"div.CodeMirror-dragcursors {" W !," visibility: visible;" W !,"}"
W !,".CodeMirror-focused div.CodeMirror-cursors {" W !," visibility: visible;" W !,"}"
W !,".CodeMirror-selected { background: #d9d9d9; }" W !,".CodeMirror-focused .CodeMirror-selected { background: #d7d4f0; }" W !,".CodeMirror-crosshair { cursor: crosshair; }" W !,".CodeMirror-line::selection, .CodeMirror-line > span::selection, .CodeMirror-line > span > span::selection { background: #d7d4f0; }" W !,".CodeMirror-line::-moz-selection, .CodeMirror-line > span::-moz-selection, .CodeMirror-line > span > span::-moz-selection { background: #d7d4f0; }"
W !,".cm-searching {" W !," background: #ffa;" W !," background: rgba(255, 255, 0, .4);" W !,"}"
W !,"/* IE7 hack to prevent it from returning funny offsetTops on the spans */" W !,".CodeMirror span { *vertical-align: text-bottom; }"
W !,"/* Used to force a border model for a node */" W !,".cm-force-border { padding-right: .1px; }"
W !,"@media print {" W !," /* Hide the cursor when printing */" W !," .CodeMirror div.CodeMirror-cursors {" W !," visibility: hidden;" W !," }" W !,"}"
W !,"/* See issue #2901 */" W !,".cm-tab-wrap-hack:after { content: ''; }"
W !,"/* Help users use markselection to safely style text background */" W !,"span.CodeMirror-selectedtext { background: none; }"

Method.name: CSSAddonMerge
Method.Implementation:
W !,".CodeMirror-merge {" W !," position: relative;" W !," border: 1px solid #ddd;" W !," white-space: pre;" W !,"}"
W !,".CodeMirror-merge, .CodeMirror-merge .CodeMirror {" W !," height: 350px;" W !,"}"
W !,".CodeMirror-merge-2pane .CodeMirror-merge-pane { width: 47%; }" W !,".CodeMirror-merge-2pane .CodeMirror-merge-gap { width: 6%; }" W !,".CodeMirror-merge-3pane .CodeMirror-merge-pane { width: 31%; }" W !,".CodeMirror-merge-3pane .CodeMirror-merge-gap { width: 3.5%; }"
W !,".CodeMirror-merge-pane {" W !," display: inline-block;" W !," white-space: normal;" W !," vertical-align: top;" W !,"}" W !,".CodeMirror-merge-pane-rightmost {" W !," position: absolute;" W !," right: 0px;" W !," z-index: 1;" W !,"}"
W !,".CodeMirror-merge-gap {" W !," z-index: 2;" W !," display: inline-block;" W !," height: 100%;" W !," -moz-box-sizing: border-box;" W !," box-sizing: border-box;" W !," overflow: hidden;" W !," border-left: 1px solid #ddd;" W !," border-right: 1px solid #ddd;" W !," position: relative;" W !," background: #f8f8f8;" W !,"}"
W !,".CodeMirror-merge-scrolllock-wrap {" W !," position: absolute;" W !," bottom: 0; left: 50%;" W !,"}" W !,".CodeMirror-merge-scrolllock {" W !," position: relative;" W !," left: -50%;" W !," cursor: pointer;" W !," color: #555;" W !," line-height: 1;" W !,"}"

W !,".CodeMirror-merge-copy {" W !," position: absolute;" W !," cursor: pointer;" W !," color: #44c;" W !," z-index: 3;" W !,"}"
W !,".CodeMirror-merge-copy-reverse {" W !," position: absolute;" W !," cursor: pointer;" W !," color: #44c;" W !,"}"
W !,".CodeMirror-merge-copybuttons-left .CodeMirror-merge-copy { left: 2px; }" W !,".CodeMirror-merge-copybuttons-right .CodeMirror-merge-copy { right: 2px; }"
W !,".CodeMirror-merge-r-inserted, .CodeMirror-merge-l-inserted {" W !," background-image: url(data:image/png;base64,iVBORw0KGgoAAAANSUhEUgAAAAMAAAACCAYAAACddGYaAAAAGUlEQVQI12MwuCXy3+CWyH8GBgYGJgYkAABZbAQ9ELXurwAAAABJRU5ErkJggg==);" W !," background-position: bottom left;" W !," background-repeat: repeat-x;" W !,"}",! W !,".CodeMirror-merge-r-deleted, .CodeMirror-merge-l-deleted {" W !," background-image: url(data:image/png;base64,iVBORw0KGgoAAAANSUhEUgAAAAMAAAACCAYAAACddGYaAAAAGUlEQVQI12M4Kyb2/6yY2H8GBgYGJgYkAABURgPz6Ks7wQAAAABJRU5ErkJggg==);" W !," background-position: bottom left;" W !," background-repeat: repeat-x;" W !,"}",! W !,".CodeMirror-merge-r-chunk { background: #ffffe0; }" W !,".CodeMirror-merge-r-chunk-start { border-top: 1px solid #ee8; }" W !,".CodeMirror-merge-r-chunk-end { border-bottom: 1px solid #ee8; }" W !,".CodeMirror-merge-r-connect { fill: #ffffe0; stroke: #ee8; stroke-width: 1px; }",! W !,".CodeMirror-merge-l-chunk { background: #eef; }" W !,".CodeMirror-merge-l-chunk-start { border-top: 1px solid #88e; }" W !,".CodeMirror-merge-l-chunk-end { border-bottom: 1px solid #88e; }" W !,".CodeMirror-merge-l-connect { fill: #eef; stroke: #88e; stroke-width: 1px; }",! W !,".CodeMirror-merge-l-chunk.CodeMirror-merge-r-chunk { background: #dfd; }" W !,".CodeMirror-merge-l-chunk-start.CodeMirror-merge-r-chunk-start { border-top: 1px solid #4e4; }" W !,".CodeMirror-merge-l-chunk-end.CodeMirror-merge-r-chunk-end { border-bottom: 1px solid #4e4; }",! W !,".CodeMirror-merge-collapsed-widget:before {" W !," content: ""(...)"";" W !,"}" W !,".CodeMirror-merge-collapsed-widget {" W !," cursor: pointer;" W !," color: #88b;" W !," background: #eef;" W !," border: 1px solid #ddf;" W !," font-size: 90%;" W !," padding: 0 3px;" W !," border-radius: 4px;" W !,"}" W !,".CodeMirror-merge-collapsed-line .CodeMirror-gutter-elt { display: none; }",!

Method.name: ScriptModeMumps
Method.Implementation: W !,"// CodeMirror, copyright (c) by Marijn Haverbeke and others" W !,"// Distributed under an MIT license: http://codemirror.net/LICENSE" W !,"" W !,"/*" W !," This MUMPS Language script was constructed using vbscript.js as a template." W !,"*/" W !,"" W !,"(function(mod) {" W !," if (typeof exports == ""object"" && typeof module == ""object"") // CommonJS" W !," mod(require(""../../lib/codemirror""));" W !," else if (typeof define == ""function"" && define.amd) // AMD" W !," define([""../../lib/codemirror""], mod);" W !," else // Plain browser env" W !," mod(CodeMirror);" W !,"})(function(CodeMirror) {" W !," ""use strict"";" W !,"" W !," CodeMirror.defineMode(""mumps"", function() {" W !," function wordRegexp(words) {" W !," return new RegExp(""^(("" + words.join("")|("") + ""))\\b"", ""i"");" W !," }" W !,"" W !," var singleOperators = new RegExp(""^[\\+\\-\\*/&#!_?\\\\<>=\\'\\[\\]]"");" W !," var doubleOperators = new RegExp(""^(('=)|(<=)|(>=)|('>)|('<)|([[)|(]])|(^$))"");" W !," var singleDelimiters = new RegExp(""^[\\.,:]"");" W !," var brackets = new RegExp(""[()]"");" W !," var identifiers = new RegExp(""^[%A-Za-z][A-Za-z0-9]*"");" W !," var commandKeywords = [""break"",""close"",""do"",""else"",""for"",""goto"", ""halt"", ""hang"", ""if"", ""job"",""kill"",""lock"",""merge"",""new"",""open"", ""quit"", ""read"", ""set"", ""tcommit"", ""trollback"", ""tstart"", ""use"", ""view"", ""write"", ""xecute"", ""b"",""c"",""d"",""e"",""f"",""g"", ""h"", ""i"", ""j"",""k"",""l"",""m"",""n"",""o"", ""q"", ""r"", ""s"", ""tc"", ""tro"", ""ts"", ""u"", ""v"", ""w"", ""x""];" W !," // The following list includes instrinsic functions _and_ special variables" W !," var intrinsicFuncsWords = [""\\$ascii"", ""\\$char"", ""\\$data"", ""\\$ecode"", ""\\$estack"", ""\\$etrap"", ""\\$extract"", ""\\$find"", ""\\$fnumber"", ""\\$get"", ""\\$horolog"", ""\\$io"", ""\\$increment"", ""\\$job"", ""\\$justify"", ""\\$length"", ""\\$name"", ""\\$next"", ""\\$order"", ""\\$piece"", ""\\$qlength"", ""\\$qsubscript"", ""\\$query"", ""\\$quit"", ""\\$random"", ""\\$reverse"", ""\\$select"", ""\\$stack"", ""\\$test"", ""\\$text"", ""\\$translate"", ""\\$view"", ""\\$x"", ""\\$y"", ""\\$a"", ""\\$c"", ""\\$d"", ""\\$e"", ""\\$ec"", ""\\$es"", ""\\$et"", ""\\$f"", ""\\$fn"", ""\\$g"", ""\\$h"", ""\\$i"", ""\\$j"", ""\\$l"", ""\\$n"", ""\\$na"", ""\\$o"", ""\\$p"", ""\\$q"", ""\\$ql"", ""\\$qs"", ""\\$r"", ""\\$re"", ""\\$s"", ""\\$st"", ""\\$t"", ""\\$tr"", ""\\$v"", ""\\$z""];" W !," var intrinsicFuncs = wordRegexp(intrinsicFuncsWords);" W !," var command = wordRegexp(commandKeywords);" W !,"" W !," function tokenBase(stream, state) {" W !," if (stream.sol()) {" W !," state.label = true;" W !," state.commandMode = 0;" W !," }" W !,"" W !," // The <space> character has meaning in MUMPS. Ignoring consecutive" W !," // spaces would interfere with interpreting whether the next non-space" W !," // character belongs to the command or argument context." W !,"" W !," // Examine each character and update a mode variable whose interpretation is:" W !," // >0 => command 0 => argument <0 => command post-conditional" W !," var ch = stream.peek();" W !,"" W !," if (ch == "" "" || ch == ""\t"") { // Pre-process <space>" W !," state.label = false;" W !," if (state.commandMode == 0)" W !," state.commandMode = 1;" W !," else if ((state.commandMode < 0) || (state.commandMode == 2))" W !," state.commandMode = 0;" W !," } else if ((ch != ""."") && (state.commandMode > 0)) {" W !," if (ch == "":"")" W !," state.commandMode = -1; // SIS - Command post-conditional" W !," else" W !," state.commandMode = 2;" W !," }" W !,"" W !," // Do not color parameter list as line tag" W !," if ((ch === ""("") || (ch === ""\u0009""))" W !," state.label = false;" W !,"" W !," // MUMPS comment starts with "";""" W !," if (ch === "";"") {" W !," stream.skipToEnd();" W !," return ""comment"";" W !," }" W !,"" W !," // Number Literals // SIS/RLM - MUMPS permits canonic number followed by concatenate operator" W !," if (stream.match(/^[-+]?\d+(\.\d+)?([eE][-+]?\d+)?/))" W !," return ""number"";" W !,"" W !," // Handle Strings" W !," if (ch == '""') {" W !," if (stream.skipTo('""')) {" W !," stream.next();" W !," return ""string"";" W !," } else {" W !," stream.skipToEnd();" W !," return ""error"";" W !," }" W !," }" W !,"" W !," // Handle operators and Delimiters" W !," if (stream.match(doubleOperators) || stream.match(singleOperators))" W !," return ""operator"";" W !,"" W !," // Prevents leading ""."" in DO block from falling through to error" W !," if (stream.match(singleDelimiters))" W !," return null;" W !,"" W !," if (brackets.test(ch)) {" W !," stream.next();" W !," return ""bracket"";" W !," }" W !,"" W !," if (state.commandMode > 0 && stream.match(command))" W !," return ""variable-2"";" W !,"" W !," if (stream.match(intrinsicFuncs))" W !," return ""builtin"";" W !,"" W !," if (stream.match(identifiers))" W !," return ""variable"";" W !,"" W !," // Detect dollar-sign when not a documented intrinsic function" W !," // ""^"" may introduce a GVN or SSVN - Color same as function" W !," if (ch === ""$"" || ch === ""^"") {" W !," stream.next();" W !," return ""builtin"";" W !," }" W !,"" W !," // MUMPS Indirection" W !," if (ch === ""@"") {" W !," stream.next();" W !," return ""string-2"";" W !," }" W !,"" W !," if (/[\w%]/.test(ch)) {" W !," stream.eatWhile(/[\w%]/);" W !," return ""variable"";" W !," }" W !,"" W !," // Handle non-detected items" W !," stream.next();" W !," return ""error"";" W !," }" W !,"" W !," return {" W !," startState: function() {" W !," return {" W !," label: false," W !," commandMode: 0" W !," };" W !," }," W !,"" W !," token: function(stream, state) {" W !," var style = tokenBase(stream, state);" W !," if (state.label) return ""tag"";" W !," return style;" W !," }" W !," };" W !," });" W !,"" W !," CodeMirror.defineMIME(""text/x-mumps"", ""mumps"");" W !,"});" W !,""

Method.name: OnPreHTTP
Method.Description: Event handler for PreHTTP event: this is invoked before the HTTP headers for a CSP page have been sent. All changes to the %CSP.Response class, such as adding cookies, HTTP headers, setting the content type etc. must be made from within the OnPreHTTP() method. Also changes to the state of the CSP application such as changing %session.EndSession or %session.AppTimeout must be made within the OnPreHTTP() method. It is prefered that changes to %session.Preserve are also made in the OnPreHTTP() method as this is more efficient, although it is supported in any section of the page. Return 0 to prevent OnPage from being called.

Parameter.name: SrcVer
Parameter.Description: Location and Revision of this file in Perforce (Auto-updating)
